front.title: Diameter Support for EAP Re-authentication Protocol

abstract.t: EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP) defines extensions to the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) to support efficient re- authentication between the EAP peer and an EAP re-authentication server through any EAP/ERP authenticator. This document specifies Diameter support for ERP. The Diameter EAP application is re-used for encapsulating the newly defined EAP codes specified in the ERP specification. Additionally, this document also defines specific Diameter processing rules relevant to ERP.
